control.description-key: Sample slider component to demonstrate basic PCF features.

property.name: step
property.description-key: Decides by how much the value gets changed when user moves the slider.

property.name: min
property.description-key: Minimal number that the slider can set the value to. If not set, the minimal value set on the bound column will be used.

property.name: max
property.description-key: Maximum number that the slider can set the value to. If not set, the maximum value set on the bound column will be used.

property.name: value
property.description-key: A column value that will be bound to the slider.
